thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Lisa D

author: Lisa D
title: Lisa D
text:
For me who can't drive I was very disappointed that part of my order was cancelled and I was not informed. I purchase the Silhouette value pack often due to my over active bladder. Do you have any suggestions and coupons so that I may continue to purchase what is required since I didn't get what I needed? I appreciate any and all information. This is the only place where I get my orders.
Best Reguards,
Loyal customer
